alert.note: Alert for Redwood; Renville (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 05 at 9:21PM CDT until June 11 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River At Morton affecting Redwood and Renville Counties. Minnesota River at Montevideo affecting Lac qui Parle, Chippewa and Yellow Medicine Counties. .Light rain will continue overnight but we are not expecting river levels to be dramatically impacted. A gradual and steady decline is still anticipated in the coming week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River At Morton. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Riverside Rd and Front Street flooded in North Redwood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 830 PM CDT Sunday, the stage was 21.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 830 PM CDT Sunday was 21.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Friday morning and continue falling to 20.7 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 21.4 feet on 05/31/2004. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
